family.$description: Font family for counter. Inherits from parent for consistency.

weight.$description: Font weight for counter. Normal weight (not bold).

text.$description: Font size for text variant (standalone). Uses body base size (1rem).

pill.$description: Font size for pill variant (button-oriented). Uses body small size (0.875rem), one step down from body base.

filter.$description: Font size for filter variant. Same as pill variant (0.875rem).

height.$description: Line height for counter. Tight line height for compact display.
